content.detailedDescription: At a few minutes after 3:00 am edt 10/07/2015 in whiting, nj 08759. a section of manchester, nj (same zip code). my home has an enclosed back porch. it is not a flimsy structure. there is a window in the door that goes out to my concrete patio. the atmospheric conditions were as clear as possible. due to my home being located in a very rural section of western ocean county, nj - in the nj pine barrens. there is a 15,000 acre protected nj game reserve. twenty feet from my back door of my enclosed porch. the edge of said game reserve is within view of the windows within my enclosed porch. i first noticed above the tree line the crescent moon in the early morning sky. i then looked to my right above the tree line. i have looked out from that same exact location on hundreds of occasions. over the course of the approaching two years since i moved into my current home. this part of western ocean county, nj is extremely rural. one of the very few location's within nj where ambient light does not impede the ability to see the night sky in an unexpectedly very clear manner. when i noticed what i believed to be what appeared to be a star as bright as the planet venus in the night sky. i had never before ever observed a star like object in this area above the pine forest tree line. based on the prior perspective & capabilities i have previously experienced. within eight seconds of noticing this "new star". it started to move at lightening fast speed diagonally on a sharp angle. having dropped below the tree line. it was very difficult to see due to the density of the forest. though, due to it's extreme brightness, i was still able to make it out through the pine tree's in the forest. it remained there for less than twenty seconds. once again, at an amazing observation of lightning fast speed. this star like appearing very bright object. soared above the tree line by what appeared to me to be an ascent of six hundred feet within less than three seconds! as i continued observing this very bright star looking like object. it continued moving up & down at truly such fast speed that it could not have been a drone or any type of manufactured airborne object from the planet earth. i watched it moving in a manner that was not consistent with anything that i had any ability to explain. it varied from very precise right & also left angle trajectory flight. once again, all movement that i saw were all occurring at lightening fast speed and beyond that specific description of truly jaw dropping speed in sync with perfect avionics. the kind of super accurate movement and motions that were unlike any traditional aircraft i had ever observed, prior to this specific event. i did not have the ability to accurately know how large this object, aka ufo was/is. beyond it maintaining it's consistent brightness. it was not pulsating. it was not changing it's size or the amount of star like bright white light that i was observing from what i in a conjectured manner of thought. possibly believed that this object was anywhere from twenty miles away from my home. upwards of it very possibly being hundred's of miles away from my home location. if it was very far away. that caused me to wonder about what the true and accurate size of this, not of this earth, flying object truly and honestly was. i do not own a telescope. i own a pair of high power binoculars. i did not want to search for them in the main part of my home. with great concern that if i stopped intently observing this most unexplained flying marvel in the early morning sky above whiting, nj 08759 at 3:00 am edt until 3:25 am edt. everything that i have communicated above was done so in an ethical and honest manner. i did not add or exaggerate anything relative to my honest observation that i have shared above. i would love to know exactly what it was that i was actually observing. fyi: my home is a fifteen minute drive from the town of lakehurst, nj ( i do not know the zip code there ). there is a very large us naval base located in lakehurst, nj. most people i know locally believe that this specific us military naval base has nuclear weapons located on its very large base. when the local & state wide nj press has inquired as to whether or not this us naval base does or does not have nuclear weapons on it's grounds or within it's large & multi-faceted infrastructure. the official spokespeople from this us military facility have consistently responded with the answer: "no comment". i've read & heard in the recent past, that ufo's are frequently attracted to military facilities that contain nuclear weapon's. possibly that's was why the specific ufo sighting i observed. very may well have been within the specific area that i have just related. beyond my original accurate described observation. which is now being honestly shared & reported here.
content.summary: Looking out my back enclosed porch window in the door. i observed the crescent moon. above the pine forest treeline. appeared to be 20 degree's higher up from the canopy of the pine forest. i originally believed i was viewing a very bright star. it moved!

content.detailedDescription: Was returning home from work at app. 9:50 p.M est on rte. 10 in sandtown delaware, when i noticed lights low above the road just clearing the trees. it was just hovering there. i got out of the truck and noticed the boomerang shaped object with lights on the sides of the craft. the lights were white, bright and steady. it then began to move slowly in the direction towards felton and harrington delaware which i estimate to be s.E. i then noticed as it moved slowly that it had a humming, swishing sound. upon telling my wife, she described hearing the humming "pulsing" sound. she was about one mile away. i've never seen anything like this other than a hand held boomerang. i was with my father-in-law who also witnessed the lights and object and said that he has never witnessed anything like that before.
content.summary: Spotted lights low over the road near treetops, got out of vehicle and noticed boomerang shaped object, then it mover

content.detailedDescription: I stepped outside to smoke around 730 pm, oct.6.2015 i sat down in my chair and was just looking up at sky when i saw what i thought at first was a star and then i realized that it was moving. it was just a white light, no blinking or colored lights like on an airplane. i opened the door and yelled at my son to come look at it. he came outside and we watched it for a few more seconds and then it just vanished. a second before it disappeared we could clearly see it slightly change directions. just this in it's self would not seem so strange except for the fact that this is the third one i have seen in two days and my son saw the same thing last sunday night. they all seem to be going in about the same direction,from west to east, but at different altitudes. all of them look the same, white, seems to be round but they are to far away to tell, they move really fast and they all move along the sky for a few seconds and then just vanish.
content.summary: Saw a bright white round object flying across the sky and then it just  disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I stepped outside and was stargazing, in the pegasus constellation i saw what appeared to be a green meteor, then a few seconds later saw what appeared to be a pulsating white-light star (not at regular intervals but seemingly randomly) then i called my girlfriend out to see it to have someone verify the sighting.  we watched it for about a minute, in that time it moved downward and off to the right (east).  we were facing approximately east-northeast, a second star type object became brighter and following the same type of pattern.  the first light stopped pulsating and went black and was no longer detectable, then the second seemed to remain constant and in the same location, watched for a few more minutes to see if anything further happened, went back inside, checked about 10 minutes later and saw aircraft in the general area and cloud-cover.
content.summary: Green meteor then pulsating star-like object in pegasus constellation

content.detailedDescription: Me and two friends were outside smoking a cigarette when i noticed and informed them of the phenomenon. there were a multitude of lights in the sky above the tree line that appeared to ascend and descend that flashed on and off in sequence. the ascension and descent of the lights made me certain that they were not any sort of artificial human light source, they were fairly far away and were still fairly wide, indicating that it may have been a single entity/craft. the lights on flashed on and off in sequence of various patterns. i as well as two friends witnessed this event.
content.summary: Wide sequential hovering flashing lights, flashed in sequence.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work on 10/6/2015 about 6 pm. i was on i695 east, the baltimore beltway, approaching route 40, coming from interstate 95. on my way home i noticed helicopter activity around parkville, then again around rosedale. one helicopter, i knew for sure was a local news station.I could tell from the markings. there was a second helo, hovering near rt 40 to my right. i wasnt sure if this was baltimore county police aviation unit or another news chopper. as i was looking to determine the markings on the second helicopter,  i saw a very large black cylindrical object high in the sky moving very fast from west to east, outside of normal flight paths.It did not have a vapor trail as normal jet aircraft would. the object looked very similar to some sightings that i have seen reported in georgia and florida in mid to late september that appeared to look like a boat or ark. i saw it go behind a very thin cloud. i could see the sky through this cloud, and the object for about a second. i did not see the object come out the other side of the cloud.  i lost sight of it at this point. there was a lot of traffic and i had to pay attention to the road in front of me. in this area, there is martin state airport, which is a maryland air national guard base. there are also frequent commercial aircraft in this area landing at baltimore washington international airport about 30 miles south of here.  i knew right away that this was not a commercial aircraft or standard military aircraft. i immediately thought to myself "i'm pretty sure i just saw a ufo." i got the chills and i am getting the chills as i write this report. i am a believer in extraterrestrial beings, and i do watch the skies. living around/near military bases and airports, i know what commercial and standard military aircraft look like and how they manuever. this object was not like anything that we have here on earth.
content.summary: Object spotted near baltimore, md

content.detailedDescription:
I was camping out near enon church carroll county on my grandfather's land.    i caught this object with multiple lights passing overhead and made a turn before disappearing into the clouds.  i was a low overcast that night.

after it left, it was several minutes before i could move.  since then i have been a near manic state at home can't sleep be the sheer shock of it.  i think it was not suppose to be seen and the craft was using the overcast as a cover, and the clouds shifted a bit or the craft inadvertently for a bit dipped under the cloud cover
content.summary: Large alien "cruiser"

content.detailedDescription: Im on safety patrol looking sw celling @ 5000 ft im in 5th grade, mayfair el school @ 1220 pm lunch time, i see a strange object fall from the clouds black smoke trail, turns 90 degrees, seems to speed up comes up flying towards me im standing on the corner of battersby and disston stlooking straight down battersby sw. it starts on fire a round sphere @ 13 ft in dia, flys over my house @ 300 mph, at an altitude @ 80 ft over my row home i turned and looked as it went by on fire, rede yellow orange flames totally on fire, as went i turned and followed it for as far i could see it,i did not go back up, i told my self it must of crashed in pennypack park or into a house, because, that night me and my dad looked at the news every night and in the paper phila inquire, and no news of it, to me it looked like ball @ 13 ft, in dia, i tell my story to every one, to me it was a ufo 1964 0r 65. i know it was a long time ago. but now i have a computer and can communicate, others what i saw back them i enjoyed astronomy very much. please call me for any or more details.  i thought it would have crashed into a house it flew over the school yard. i ran to school yard and asked my friendsif they saw the thing on fire one fellow said he saw it but was not sure what it was but i had a great view of it, i thought it would go back up but it did not i looked for it but it did not go back up i calculated that would by the speed it flew and the direction flew it either hit  house or landed in pennypack park by sandyford ave. to this date if i go north i would look for it with my friends that bicycle there all the time.
content.summary: Fire ball from sw over my house 100 ft @ 300 mph. probably lanedin pennypark phila pa

content.detailedDescription:
Radium b.C. sitting on top level of motel looking north east direction.

white circle appeared. did not fly into view, simply appeared. the sky was clear and blue. the circle changed its shape to oblong, then returned to perfect circle. total view time, 9 seconds. i'll never forget it. vanished into thin air!!  can only call sighting unidentified object.
content.summary: Perfect white circle appeared after 3 sec changed shape to oblong then returned to perfect circle then vanished total 9 seconds

content.detailedDescription: On 10/03/2015 we were at the mir mar naval air show watching all the different aircraft. 3:53 pm the french jet team was performing their stunts.My son who was with me said what is that? he grabbed his camera cell phone and took these pictures.It was hot and sunny so we did not really look at the pictures until we got to our hotel rooms.If you look close,the lights on the cylinder casts a shadow from the sun below. it seems the object ejects a contrail center left towards the sun on the bottom.
content.summary: Mir mar naval air show. breitling jet team

content.detailedDescription: I saw a round aluminum like object flying in a straght line under the clouds, then it dissapearded. it had no windows, no wings, no lights and it was flying in a straight line (pretty fast) the sun would sine on it when it came out of the clouds, i told my buddy and he saw it also. then it went into a cloud but never came out.
content.summary: I saw a round aluminum like object flying in a straght line under the clouds, then it dissapearded

content.detailedDescription: I was at home about 5 am in the morning as 02 the network shut down on the 12/july/2012, i left my home as my radio was changing on its own, and then i spotted it hovering towards the top of my flat, i could not work out what is was but i knew it was ufo, a spaceship it looked it was going to abduct me from my flat, it was black and silver a sphere shape object hovering towards the top iof my flat, it stopped when i spotted it and sort of just stayed there for a min or two, i looked away to spot a strang looking magpie, that seemed artificiall and not real, it seemed to be working with the ufo, like they had some sort of connection, it flew away after staring at me like it was a computer of some kind a robot, it was looking at me like a human it darted of in the bush, i looked back up towards the top of my flat to spot a, tail like fire beaming through the sky fast as light the ufo abouve my flat had gone it was tearing through the sky i could see the fire tail like a yellow beam and the object going fast; it opened up a orange triangle in the sky and warped through it. and it was gone. i phone my mate to tell him but in honesly this thing was going to ubduct me. there is more detail to it this is a short statement
content.summary: Above flat as my radio was changing so i left flat to witness  a spaceship ufo hovering above my flat slowly as if it was going to abduct me,

content.detailedDescription:
i was having good time with friends in a mountain (1000 meters above sea level) near my city. at a point i got down from the car to take some pictures of the forest, while i saw a strange white circle moving out of the clouds. i run to try and get a closer look but it was far from the mountain route i would say at least 150 meters higher than the mountain. at a closer look it looked like a white sphere and not am airplane for sure since it was all round and i was sure it is a solid thing cause the sun light reflected on its surface. it was moving slowly, quietly and gradually ascending through the sky and moving further and further until it disappear. 

i managed to take 4 pictures with my 12megapixel camera, two of them the camera went out of focus the other two were okay but not perfect. 

the ufo region is highlighted with a red box.
content.summary: White sphere ufo moving slowly through the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting out a window of the house i was in smoking a cigarette (around 3 am) when i saw very clearly a green fireball crash down less than a mile away. this was right after the meteor in russia so i jumped back in the house expecting a shockwave. didn't think a whole lot more about it that night. what really started to get me a bit freaked out was the military activity in the area every night for the next week or more. i saw helicopters searching the area, sometimes there seemed to be a large helicopter being followed by a regular one. also large black suvs were driving far too quickly by the house regularly. along with this there is a small airport in view from the house where nothing ever happens at night however i saw, on more than one occasion, lights on with what looked to me to be large military convoys going too and from the airport. this went on for quite some time but always very late at night (early am). so to summarize the real interest in this event was the activity following the sighting rather than the sighting itself. the time i spent watching what was happening is still vivid in my mind and i think about it often with the hopes of one day having some sort of explanation.
content.summary: Green fireball followed by weeks of military activity in area

content.detailedDescription: Myself and my friend were out smoking a cig when i noticed a hovering object to the north at around 500 ft in the distance approx. 1 mile away.  several other small objects moving around larger object then 1 smaller object passed through larger object.  observed for over 30 minutes hovering and then moving up and hovering for another 10 minutes several objects. then object came towards us moving south at an estimated 200 to 500 ft making no sound whatsoever could not see shape of object only multi colored lights. second similar object spotted at the same time to the west which got brighter and dimmer then disappeared.  several eyewitnesses to this event. i am former military and i have never witnessed anything like this.  several minutes later witnessed a similar craft and the passing through by another craft to the north west the small object that passed through then turned into 2 red lights solid.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Hovering object pulsating multiple colors objects passed through eachother

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home and ready to go to bed and turned off the lights. when approached the window which was open,  i observed two green light hovering over the creek about 100 feet from at about eye level. i was on second floor.  took video and activated my theodolite for exact parameters. 

i run outside, it was the same two green lights were hovering with same pattern about 15 minutes.  could of been also projectors from down from creek side.  pattern of movement was steady and synchronized, about 5 minutes later few more 5 orbs or lights joined the circle of lights. 

got exited and eventually and walked away.  when next time i looked 30 minutes later lights  were no longer there.
content.summary: two green lights hovering with same pattern of movement over the creek.

content.detailedDescription: I was at work on sunday september 20 2015,we were going outside to have a smoke brake, we all sat down on the curb, i ladyed back on the ground, that's when i  noticed what looked like a bright star. it was a beautiful day out, not one cloud in the sky (blue), i watched the star like object for about five minutes. it did not move in the sky at all it stayed in one spot but every once in a while it looks to me like it was spinning clockwise every once in a while i would see a glare of sunlight reflecting  off the object like it was spinning. not sure how high it was up in the sky just north of where i work is in airport  for personal aircraft, commercial planes fly overhead all day long from chicago airports  we live close to lake michigan ( southwest michigan )  sure this was not a plane  it looked so much like a star but closer , after watching the object for about five minutes i thought i might want to go get my  phone ( camera ) when i came back outside it was still there.I recorded it until it just disappeared i didn't see it do any movements it's like it went straight up and disappeared. after this all happened i tried to just blow this off,but two weeks have gone by and i still can't stop thinking about it, i'm sure this was not a plane,a star,a  satellite , or a weather balloon, hopefully you can analyze the footage i have and see if you can figure out what this is
content.summary: Me and a fellow employee went out the front door at work to smoke, we sat down on ground, i looked up a saw object

content.detailedDescription: I don't know what this is. it's driving me crazy. please, help me figure out what it is. please blow up the picture. pay attention to the little orb. it has 6 bright areas on it.
content.summary: What is this???

content.detailedDescription:
Watching the sky like almost every night relaxing at the pool bench, this object caght my attention because you could see the object moving kimd of slow but like a shadow.
hovering, slow making no sound at all, translucent object at moderate speed. i tried to follow the obejct but it disapeared in the night. you could see the the shape of the obejct by the flashing lights, not so bright, low altitude. i live in the 78504 code and could se it anymore after like 45 seconds.
content.summary: Hovering, slow making no sound at all, translucent object at moderate speed

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my balcony like i do most nights star gazing. i looked up and noticed what  i thought was a star or plane light get brighter and brighter. size grew with brightness and then after a few seconds disappeared. after a few seconds the light came back on and brighter again. this happened a total of three times over a period of 4-6 minutes. no noise was heard. this was right after  the rain storm and there was some lighting but not close to this star like object. no clouds. skies were clear. this was nothing like i have ever saw in the sky. this was not a plane or helicopter light from m my opinion; not from that distance. the light appeared to be as high as the stars almost. this is why i cannot explain how the light was so big and bright. this really amazed me. i guess this could be a government or military thing but i will not know anytime soon. if it was not a ufo and it is military or government, i just hope it belongs to the united states.
content.summary: Was as high as the stars which i though it was at first but then shined real bright three times.I am a star gazer and have never saw a star or plane shine this big and bright. no noise.

content.detailedDescription: As a teenager and coming home from a movie i believe in a friends dads car we were aproching port sydney from the north.My friend pete who was in the front of the car stated that there was lights slowly moving towards us as we were slowing to exit the highway to our left.I at the time being in the back seat said that they were probably lights over the cement plant and he was addiment that it was not. i remember looking in to the front and out the windsheild and seeing the 3 lights moving over us at the turnoff on the highway.We were all excited and when the car stopped (still on the highway) we all got out and were in aw at something we could not understand. i remember yelling beem me up as a teenager would do i guess and after moment this triangle of lights --(with no noise) changed altitude and direction 3 times staying right overhead' it then started moving n to nw as we raced to get back in the car an crossed the lanes to follow it at 140 miles an hour as the speedometer said for about 2 mile and then left at the speed of light.
content.summary: Myself and 4 friends heading home as teenagers witnessed a triangular shape of lights moving slowly across the highway in wich we were heading south.At our turn off we all got out of the car and watched these lights move slowly in a turn and elevated3 tim

content.detailedDescription: I live near the san antonio airport. after returning home at 8:45 in the morning i open my door and turned on my video camera for 45 seconds to video the clouds by my apartment. recently almost every time i turn on my video camera and aim it in the sky to work clouds i have picked up anomalies or ufos when i reviewed the video at slow speed. this time was different because instead of one or two i saw a cluster of rapid moving dark objects that we're circular when standing still and straightened as they moved very quick in the sky. they appeared like vipers from the show battlestar galactica in attack formation but they were solid black and their shape was transforming from circular to spiky. in the 45 second video 20 to 30 of that t multiple craft moving leftward towards the airport sometimes three or four objects at a time. they would stop some would change directions 90 to 180 degrees and then go straight upward while the remainder went left and forward in a very straight formation. normally when i have reviewed videos in slow motion ic 5 - 10 frames of anomaly ufo movement. this time was the first time i caught a swarm of them. i would not have seen them if i did not have my video camera. they move too fast for my eyes to capture them. this is about the xx ufo have seen in the past few months by videotaping these guys in the airport area of san antonio texas. i have one video where a ufo comes out of the clouds descends to the tail of a jumbo jet and in 6 or 7 frames passes that jumbo jet and disappears out of sight. that while i was walking my dogs.
content.summary: Black fast moving,had to slow video to see.30 frames sec.Moved cross sky in 8frames

content.detailedDescription: This event occurred while was on vacation at disney world. we were in the line for the seven dwarfs mine train, one of the new rides disney released. this having being my second ufo sighting and report, i always look at the skies in hopes of seeing another light. the line was very long so i was not in the building to the ride yet. i was scanning the skies and didn't see anything, when i looked right above my head. i saw a bright blue light, almost like a helicopter spotlight right on top of me. at first i assumed it was the north star because that is the closest thing that i could relate to it. as i'm watching this light or beam, i didn't think it was a ufo at all, more of like a star. as i'm watching the object, the light dims rapidly to a normal star size with a dim blue color. as the object hovers above me, it then moves rapidly across the sky in a smooth motion until it fades its color with the surrounding horizon. this is my second encounter like i said, but this will never be as dramatic as the first one.
content.summary: Ufo shines bright light while hovering then moves in disney world

content.detailedDescription: We saw an orange ball of light in the north west of jefferson county illinois. the light slowly ascended into the sky until it was no longer visible. there was a lot of air traffic in the area after the sighting. including two planes flying side by side. the planes were to high to see what the planes looked like.
content.summary: Orange ball of light slowly rising up into sky then vanishing. a lot of airplanes show up after it is gone.

content.detailedDescription:
To whom it may concern:
      i was traveling east on nys route 347 nesconset–port jefferson highway and, as i approached traffic light to make a left onto belle mead rd on way home from school i noticed at first 5 orange orbs in the sky. 
     they were very bright, more than anything in the background and more than street lights or anything else in my view.  they moved in a random way at first like up, down, left, right. some would approach each other, and then go back to a position where they were all traveling in same direction, which appeared north; this was toward my left. there was absolutely no sound from them or their movement. once i realized i was seeing something i never saw before, i felt the lack of ability to explain it. i then started to snap pictures with my cell phone. i took five in total. two while approaching the traffic light, and when said traffic light turned green i turned left which was the way home and they were still moving north. 
     once driving i tried to snap more pictures and zoom in with cell phone; i managed to get three more pictures. there were definitely six or possibly seven bright orange orbs. they almost flickered, like different parts or points within the same “orb” were brighter: orange to darker orange –red, as they were very easy to see in the sky. this was while i was moving and so where they. they were above the trees and power lines and appeared far away, yet brighter and so pronounced they felt close. the size of each individual orb relative to me, is the size of the diameter of a pen cap if held at arm’s length. they were very fast as they went past my line of sight over the trees and i continued to drive home. after a split second i thought of attempting to follow them somehow, though i was confused and not actually sure what i had witnessed. this all happened in about 2 minutes time. 
     this led me to search for information and this is how i found this site. so many people have seen things which sound as if they are what i have saw. i cannot un-see this, and have continued faith that there is some explanation and all is well in the world.
content.summary: 6-7 orange flying orbs traveling together in one direction in staggered arrangement, with simultaneous movements capable of up, down, left, right, at great speeds.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving on my way to work along the trilogy road towards trilogy housing, when i spotted a very bright almost star bright light in the sky. the sky was clear with no clouds.  this was around 7:30 in the morning. pacific standard time. the star bright object was "v" shaped. because the object was so bright, it caught my attention.  i thought how strange it was to see something so bright during the day.

i noticed that the object did not move from where i was, even when i had pulled off on the side of the road.  it seemed to stay or hover in one place and not move around.  it appeared that it might be a couple of miles out, perhaps over the valley in the east ( the valley is mostly pasture with a  river running through it, but it was hard for me to make a judgment call as to how far.  and now that i think about it, the object might be even bigger than i originally thought.  unfortunately by the time i remembered i had my cell phone, it was to late to take a picture.

i watched it for about 5 minutes then it seemed to just fade away. i thought for a while that i had just seen a plane reflecting light from the sun, but when a plane did fly by (about 1 minute later, in the general direction of the object), i noticed that the lighting on the plane was completely different from what i had seen with the object.
the bottom of the plane did not reflect the light the same way that the object in the sky did, and the plane slowly grew smaller and smaller as it flew away. you could tell that it was a plane.  the object i saw just stayed the same size and then faded away.
content.summary: "v"shaped object hovered in sky for about 5 mintues, then slowly faded away.

content.detailedDescription: Went outside to enjoy night sky.  stood in middle of street facing east.  conditions cloudy.  obs obj as it crossed a break in clouds.  obj was large, dark, almost black, "y" shaped and had regularly shaped & spaced light colored circles along entire underside.  the "foot" of the "y" was pointed in the direction of travel, which was approx. ne -> sw. i didn't hear any sounds from the obj.  i did not obs the obj leave the other side of the cloud it crossed over to, it disappeared (could have gone straight up?).  the obj left no trail nor sign of turbulence.  i had about 3-4 seconds of unobstructed viewing.
content.summary: Large "y" shaped flying object

content.detailedDescription: I was grilling up some dinner watching several planes fly around as the sun was lowering in the sky making it easier to see the planes reflections at about 6:30. then as i turned my head another object caught my eye hovering around the edge of some whispy clouds, i thought is was a balloon at first and blew it off, after a minute or so i saw again an  it didn't appear to move it appeared to have  the shape of top an  seemed to rotate so the sun caught different angles but when i went for my binoculars i lost it and couldn't  find the binoculars to confirm anything so i grabbed my son but he couldn't see it.
content.summary: An oval top-like object that appeared to rotate so light was reflected off top half hovered on edge of whispy clouds for about 8 min

content.detailedDescription: Traveling to alaska after the sturgis bike rally in sturgis south dakota i camped alone in center of british columbia. i started star gazing after setting up tent. i noticed what seemed to look like a star traveling at a great speed the stopping abruptly.Moving in a straight line,then vertically then diagonally and vertically in a random pattern. i watched for appox 90-100 minutes till my neck ached. this happened   above the big dipper. the travel of the object was the width of big dipper in the blink of an eye. most of the movement was as high as the 3rd star of the handle and over to the right to a distance no further than the bottom star of the dipper(right). im not too sure of the date but i spent the first full week at the sturgis rally.This happened 4-5 days later. ive been thinking alot since then. i know someone must have seen something similar to what i have witnessed.Please call me to give my mind some relief.Steve lincoln 16314 watersedge,vicksburg,mich. 49097    phone 269 679 5171   i stopped watching because i went to bed after a long ride.
content.summary: I saw a starlike object moving in a random pattern above the big dipper for appx. 90 minutes zooming the size of big dipper.

content.detailedDescription: In the summer of 1984 myself and a girl i new (jackie)were in a field at tom sawyer state park at about 10:00 pm (dark) when off in the distance we saw an object coming our way.  the object approached us quickly and passed us directly over head. it was directly over head, and continued on a path away from us. it was moving very fast and not making a sound.  it was very large close to the size of a football field.  what stood out was the sight of about 30 to 50 white speres thought were bouncing along behind the craft.  this sight has been in my memory since the night i saw it.  also a jefferson county police car came flying into the parking lot after the craft had passed us.  the whole event lasted 15 to 20 seconds and the craft must have covered many miles in the time of our first sighting and it moving out of sight. i have wanted to report my sighting for many years and never got around to it.  i know this happened many years ago and most likely will not help in your investigations.  i believe the local news reported that a russian satellite had passed over louisville that night.  what i witnessed was no satellite, it passed directly over my head, i could not of seen it any better, it ws very big.
content.summary: I saw a ufo
